issue.title: Problem with 3D-Lidar in Headless mode in VirtualBox

content.raw:
I remember seeing errors complaining that the gl texture format used by gpu ray sensor is not supported when testing on a machine that did not have a discrete gpu card. 

The fix is likely to involve breaking changes in ign-rendering and ign-sensors so it may not make it into urban circuit. cc @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817}
content.html:
I remember seeing errors complaining that the gl texture format used by gpu ray sensor is not supported when testing on a machine that did not have a discrete gpu card.

The fix is likely to involve breaking changes in ign-rendering and ign-sensors so it may not make it into urban circuit. cc @Alfredo Bencomo
